name: MEC Airflow No Show Run Socks 2 Pack - Unisex

description: Don't let hot feet distract you from your goals. Synthetic mesh is highly breathable and moisture-wicking so your feet stay cool and dry, and you can focus on pushing your 10km time.Made of moisture-wicking nylon and spandex for dry feet all run long.Mesh structure vents excess heat to keep feet cool.Arch support and seamless toe for a bunch- and chafe-free run.
